definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji

sentences.english: Agriculture provides the economic base with major exports made up of copra and citrus fruit.
sentences.chinese: 农业以提供干椰子肉和柑橘类的出口为经济基础。

sentences.english: No doubt， the key is to build a solid economic foundation.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，解决问题的关键是建立稳固的经济基础。

sentences.english: The economic foundation is far from being sound, and the current situation remains severe.
sentences.chinese: 经济基础还很不稳固，目前的形势依然严峻。

sentences.english: With the change of the economic foundation， the superstructure has to be transformed too.
sentences.chinese: 随着经济基础的改变，上层建筑也必须改造。

sentences.english: Asian countries have a good economic foundation and great potentials.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲各国有着良好的经济基础和发展潜力。

sentences.english: That is to say, in the last analysis, it serves the economic base .
sentences.chinese: 这就是说，归根结蒂，它是为经济基础服务的。

sentences.english: How does the economic base determine superstructure?
sentences.chinese: 经济基础如何决定上层建筑？

sentences.english: Sahrawis out at elbows could never manage to live in Town Ayongs.
sentences.chinese: 没有经济基础的沙哈拉威是不可能住到小镇阿雍来的。

sentences.english: With amazing rapidity, young Chiang knocked away the props of his father's economic support.
sentences.chinese: 小蒋以惊人的速度打掉了他父亲经济基础的支柱。

sentences.english: He said that economic and trade cooperation is the economic basis for state-to-state relations.
sentences.chinese: 他说，经贸合作是国家关系的经济基础。

sentences.english: Has the munificent technical force and the abundant economic basis.
sentences.chinese: 有优厚的技术力量和雄厚的经济基础。

sentences.english: The country is superstructure, it is OK and active the ground is counteractive at economic base.
sentences.chinese: 国家是上层建筑，它可以能动地反作用于经济基础。

sentences.english: Postdocs can, however, lay the groundwork for financial prosperity during those years.
sentences.chinese: 然而，博士后可以在此期间打下经济基础。

sentences.english: B contrast the economic base of the city governent with that of the tribal confederacies.
sentences.chinese: 将部落联邦与城市城邦制度的经济基础作对比。

definition: independent and autonomous (idiom); self-determination/to act independently/to maintain control over one's own affairs
natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)
Fuyu county in Qiqihar 齊齊哈爾|齐齐哈尔[Qi2 qi2 ha1 er3], Heilongjiang
